nodes.text: Ng'ok, commonly known as Ng'ok war beasts, were foul-tempered creatures and were usually accompanied by an awful smell. They were equipped with two razor-sharp retractable claws and a tiny lashing tail. They were commonly used in many systems by owners to guard and to frighten off potential attackers.
Ng'ok were represented as a holomonster playing piece in the game of dejarik. A Sith speeder was named after the Ng'ok.

An origin for the Ng'oks was mentioned in the article Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon, however the article was never officially published. The related information that was to be published in the article is outlined below.
The Ng'ok were among the many creatures created by the experiments of Cold Danda Sine on Forhilnor.
